name: places/ChIJRyOGRWn2wokR6zu1hj7ywG0
formattedAddress: 1420 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1420 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
I am writing to express my mother’s and my sincere appreciation for the incredible service we received from PA Eric Behrens, who we had the pleasure to be helped by. PA Behrens administered my mother’s Orthovisc shots at Dr. Youm’s office. He deserves a great deal of praise for his professionalism, knowledge, and kindness.

My mother has been experiencing decapitating right knee pain, secondary from arthritis and a meniscus tear. This was unbelievably frightening and frustrating. PA Behrens ability to calm my mother down and safely administer her series of three shots with a sonogram for ideal placement was unparalleled. He ensured that she was comfortable, and that I understood the process as well. He helped always with a smile, and offered to administer another shot in a couple of months if she needs it.

It is because of the excellent character and qualities PA Behrens demonstrated that I can rest easy that my mother is going to be alright, because I trust him. My mother also does, and she really likes his bedside manner.

She started physical therapy now, and reports feeling 60% better so far. Thank you so much from the both of us for your help!
